item.title: 中国希望联合国对人权的审查是建设性的、非政治化的
item.description: The Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday that it hoped all parties at the United Nations reviewing China's human rights record would be "constructive" and "non-politicised".翻译:中国外交部周二表示，希望联合国各方以“建设性”和“非政治化”的方式审查中国的人权记录。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国采取措施支撑股市
item.description: Chinese shares rebounded on Tuesday on a Bloomberg News report that said Chinese authorities are considering several measures to bolster the stock market.翻译:彭博新闻社报道称，中国当局正在考虑采取多项措施来提振股市，中国股市周二反弹。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 投资者对中国市场崩溃的看法
item.description: Stock markets in China and Hong Kong have slumped to multi-year lows this week as confidence in the world's second-biggest economy has evaporated and foreign money has fled, while data showed sputtering growth and deepening real estate malaise.翻译:由于人们对世界第二大经济体的信心消失，外国资金逃离，而数据显示经济增长缓慢，房地产市场萎靡不振，中国和香港股市本周跌至多年低点。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德国总统和企业访问越南关注劳工协议和投资
item.description: A German business delegation, including top firms for tunnel machines, wind farms and industrial supplies, is joining President Frank-Walter Steinmeier in a visit to Vietnam starting on Tuesday, as Berlin pushes its China de-risking strategy.翻译:一个由隧道机械、风力发电场和工业供应领域的顶级公司组成的德国商业代表团将于周二开始与总统弗兰克-瓦尔特·施泰因迈尔一起访问越南，以推动其对华去风险战略。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio, Phuong Nguyen

item.title: 新加坡亚洲创世纪 (Asia Genesis) 在押注中国和日本失败后关闭对冲基金
item.description: Singapore-based Asia Genesis Asset Management is liquidating its hedge fund after a "significant and unprecedented drawdown" following missteps in Chinese and Japanese bets.翻译:总部位于新加坡的亚洲创世纪资产管理公司(Asia Genesis Asset Management)正在清算其对冲基金，该基金在中国和日本押注失误后出现了“前所未有的大幅缩水”。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本央行与通缩心态作斗争
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国股票衍生品暴跌，韩国散户投资者遭受打击
item.description: South Korean retail investors have been caught out by an 11% fall in a key Hong Kong stock market index this month, as losses begin to materialise from about 15.4 trillion won ($11.50 billion) of index-linked derivatives that mature this year.翻译:本月，香港主要股市指数下跌 11%，韩国散户投资者陷入困境，今年到期的约 15.4 万亿韩元（合 115 亿美元）的指数挂钩衍生品开始带来损失。
item.author: Jihoon Lee, Cynthia Kim

item.title: 特斯拉将于1月下旬开启Cyber​​truck中国行-外媒
item.description: A China-wide tour showcasing Tesla's flagship Cybertruck pickup will kick off in late January, with eight trucks simultaneously on display in eight cities including Shanghai and the capital, Beijing, media outlet the Paper said on Tuesday.翻译:据澎湃新闻周二报道，特斯拉旗舰款 Cyber​​truck 皮卡全国巡展将于 1 月下旬拉开帷幕，8 辆卡车将在上海、首都北京等 8 个城市同时展出。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国监管机构从网站上删除了视频游戏规则草案；股价上涨
item.description: China's gaming regulator has removed from its website rules it proposed last month aimed at curbing spending and rewards that encourage playing video games, checks by Reuters on Tuesday showed, in a move that boosted gaming company shares.翻译:路透社周二的调查显示，中国游戏监管机构已从其网站上删除了上个月提出的旨在限制鼓励玩视频游戏的支出和奖励的规定，此举提振了游戏公司的股价。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 中国山体滑坡死亡人数上升至20人 救援人员仍在搜寻失踪者
item.description: The death toll from a landslide in China's Yunnan province rose to 20 on Tuesday afternoon as rescue workers battled freezing temperatures and snow to locate dozens of missing people.翻译:周二下午，中国云南省山体滑坡造成的死亡人数上升至 20 人，救援人员在严寒和大雪中奋力寻找数十名失踪人员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国正在考虑2780亿美元的股市救助计划 - 彭博社
item.description: Chinese authorities are considering measures to stabilise a slumping stock market, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter, drawing a sceptical response from underwhelmed investors.翻译:彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，中国当局正在考虑采取措施稳定暴跌的股市，此举引起了平淡投资者的质疑。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 供应线索不一，油价稳定，中国前景谨慎
item.description: Oil prices were little changed on Tuesday as traders weighed a host of conflicting supply and demand worries, from rising tensions in the Middle East to cold weather woes disrupting production in the United States.翻译:周二油价几乎没有变化，交易员权衡了一系列相互冲突的供需担忧，从中东紧张局势升级到寒冷天气扰乱美国生产。
item.author: Emily Chow, Trixie Yap

item.title: 路透调查显示韩国第四季度经济增速可能略有放缓
item.description: South Korea's economy expanded at a slightly slower pace in the final three months of 2023 compared to Q3 as elevated interest rates held back domestic demand despite higher exports, according to economists polled by Reuters.翻译:路透社调查的经济学家表示，与第三季度相比，韩国经济在 2023 年最后三个月的扩张速度略有放缓，因为尽管出口增加，但利率上升抑制了内需。
item.author: Veronica Khongwir

item.title: 日本股市触及 34 年新高，日本央行按兵不动，中国陷入困境
item.description: Japanese shares surged on hopes the Bank of Japan will not pivot away from its super easy policy any time soon.翻译:由于希望日本央行不会很快放弃其超级宽松政策，日本股市飙升。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 日元走强，暗示政策可能会发生变化；中国市场救援谈话提振人民币和澳元
item.description: The Japanese yen reversed course on Tuesday firming on hints the Bank of Japan might tweak policy at its next meeting, having earlier dipped after the central bank matched market expectations and maintained its ultra-easy monetary settings.翻译:日元周二逆转走势，因暗示日本央行可能在下次会议上调整政策，日元在央行符合市场预期并维持超宽松货币政策后下跌。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 中国音乐学生因涉嫌威胁活动人士而面临美国审判
item.description: A Chinese music student went on trial on Monday on U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement.翻译:周一，一名中国音乐学生在美国受审，罪名是骚扰一名在波士顿伯克利音乐学院张贴支持中国民主传单的活动人士，并威胁要向中国执法部门举报她的活动。
item.author: Nate Raymond

item.title: 中国“复苏乏力”对美国经济没有产生强烈影响——布雷纳德
item.description: China's lackluster economic recovery has not had a particularly strong effect on the U.S. economy given diversification of supply chains over the past years, White House National Economic Council Director Lael Brainard said on Monday.翻译:白宫国家经济委员会主任莱尔·布雷纳德周一表示，鉴于过去几年供应链的多元化，中国经济复苏乏力并未对美国经济产生特别强烈的影响。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 加拿大为何限制外国学生？哪些人会受到影响？
item.description: Canada's immigration minister said the government will introduce a temporary, two-year cap on the intake of foreign students after explosive growth in recent years aggravated the country's housing shortage. Here is what is at stake.翻译:加拿大移民部长表示，在近年来的爆炸性增长加剧了该国的住房短缺之后，政府将对外国学生的招生实行为期两年的临时上限。这就是关键所在。
item.author: Wa Lone

item.title: 独家：中国游说各国在联合国审查前赞扬其人权记录——外交官
item.description: China has been lobbying non-Western countries to praise its human rights record ahead of a key U.N. meeting where it will face questions and criticism over its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang, according to diplomats and documents.翻译:据外交官和文件称，中国一直在游说非西方国家在联合国重要会议之前赞扬其人权记录，届时中国将因其在香港和新疆的行为而面临质疑和批评。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 尽管经济放缓，北京仍提高了2024年的增长目标
item.description: China's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy.翻译:尽管国民经济增长预期放缓，但中国首都北京仍设定了2024年5%左右的增长目标，超过了去年4.5%以上的目标。
item.author: Reuters
